message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper proposes a method for fusing 2D images and 3D point clouds for 3D scene understanding, specifically for the task of 3D semantic segmentation. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also involves the use of point-based networks and view selection, which are common in robotics (cs.RO) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). Additionally, the paper deals with 3D data and canonical space, which are relevant to computer graphics (cs.GR).
